item.title: PlayStation 关闭《协和》视频游戏失败背后的工作室
item.description: 索尼集团公司的 PlayStation 部门将关闭射击游戏《协和》的开发商 Firewalk Studios。【原文：Sony Group Corp.’s PlayStation unit will shut down Firewalk Studios, developer of the shooter game Concord, which was taken offline two weeks after its release earlier this year.】

item.title: 普雷斯顿-霍洛（Preston Hollow）小额贷款公司正在探索出售事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，普雷斯顿空心社区资本公司（Preston Hollow Community Capital）正在探索包括出售在内的战略选择。【原文：Preston Hollow Community Capital, a municipal finance lender, is exploring strategic options including a sale, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 西门子即将达成收购软件集团 Altair 的交易
item.description: 知情人士透露，西门子公司即将同意收购软件制造商 Altair Engineering Inc.【原文：Siemens AG is close to agreeing to a deal to buy software maker Altair Engineering Inc., people familiar with the matter said, in what would be its largest-ever acquisition.】

item.title: 好莱坞母校哈佛西湖分校选择 Munis 打造新校区
item.description: 哈佛西湖学校（Harvard-Westlake School）是美国最顶级的私立学校之一，因培养了一代又一代的好莱坞明星而闻名于世。【原文：Harvard-Westlake School, one of the country’s most exclusive private schools famous for educating generations of Hollywood stars, is tapping the public debt markets for the first time.】

item.title: 人工智能蓬勃发展，ASM 订单超出预期
item.description: ASM International NV 第三季度的订单超过预期，原因是人工智能热潮推动了对这家荷兰公司先进芯片制造工具的需求。【原文：ASM International NV’s orders beat estimates in the third quarter, as the artificial intelligence boom drives demand for the Dutch firm’s advanced chipmaking tools.】

item.title: 民调显示选情胶着，特朗普媒体支持率高达 330
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体公司股价延续了连续五周的涨势，为这家公司增加了超过 80 亿美元的价值，有人预计，如果这位前总统在下周的大选中获胜，这家公司将大幅受益。【原文：Shares in Donald Trump’s social media company extended a five-week rally that’s added more than $8 billion in value to a company some expect will benefit sharply if the former president wins next week’s election.】

item.title: 波兰 2024 年预算缺口因税收流入减少和洪水而扩大
item.description: 波兰政府上调了 2024 年的预算赤字，原因是增值税收入低于预期，加上毁灭性洪灾引发的额外支出，使财政计划捉襟见肘。【原文：Poland’s government revised up its 2024 budget deficit as lower than expected value-added tax revenues strain the fiscal plan along with additional spending triggered by a devastating flood.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称，马斯克的 xAI 公司正在洽谈 400 亿美元估值事宜
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司 xAI 正在洽谈以 400 亿美元的估值进行新一轮融资。【原文：Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI is in talks to raise new funding at a $40 billion valuation, the Wall Street Journal reported, just months after a separate financing for the startup raised $6 billion.】

item.title: 博通因与 OpenAI 合作的报道而上涨
item.description: 据路透社报道，OpenAI 正在与博通公司合作开发一款新的人工智能芯片，博通公司股价上涨达 4%。【原文：Broadcom Inc. shares gained as much as 4% after Reuters reported that OpenAI is working with the company on a new artificial intelligence chip.】

item.title: 摩根大通和贝尔德在大选前热衷于购买小额债券
item.description: 一些投资者急于在大选导致供应减少之前购买市政债券。【原文：Some investors are eager to buy municipal bonds before supply tapers off because of the elections.】

item.title: Netflix 在扩展协议中加入环球公司的真人电影
item.description: Netflix Inc. 将与康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp.【原文：Netflix Inc. is renewing its licensing agreement with Comcast Corp.’s NBCUniversal to screen animated films from subsidiaries DreamWorks Animation and Illumination, and is expanding the deal to include live-action films starting in 2027.】

item.title: 微软 GitHub 部门削减与谷歌、Anthropic 的人工智能协议
item.description:
GitHub 的 Copilot 编码助手将提供新的 AI 模型，供希望从 OpenAI 转用的用户选择。【原文：

GitHub’s Copilot coding assistant will offer new AI models as option for users who want to switch from OpenAI.

】

item.title: 斯洛伐克 20 亿欧元欧洲债券吸引投资者强劲需求
item.description: 斯洛伐克政府采取一揽子措施抑制预算赤字，在风险溢价下降的情况下，通过银团销售出售了 20 亿欧元的欧洲债券。【原文：Slovakia sold €2 billion of Eurobonds in a syndicated sale amid a declining risk premium after the government adopted a package of measures to curb the budget deficit.】

item.title: 大型石油公司认为人工智能的蓬勃发展推动了美国天然气的 "疯狂需求
item.description: 被称为 "超大规模企业 "的科技巨头们正在快速发展云计算和人工智能，能源需求的激增正成为化石燃料行业的一大福音。【原文：A surge in energy demand from technology giants that are rapidly developing cloud computing and artificial intelligence — known as hyperscalers — is becoming a major boon for the fossil fuel industry.】

item.title: 拉脱维亚法院判处前银行业主谋杀 2018 年律师罪名成立
item.description: 拉脱维亚一家法院判处一名前银行老板和另外两名男子长期监禁，罪名是六年前谋杀了一名著名律师。【原文：A Latvian court handed down lengthy prison terms to an ex-bank owner and two other men for the murder of a prominent lawyer six years ago.】

item.title: 新管道使加拿大原油进入稳定期
item.description: 加拿大重质原油的折扣是两年多来最稳定的，因为扩建后的跨山输油管道的启动为该国的石油生产商提供了新的运输选择和更广泛的买家群体。【原文：The discount on Canadian heavy crude is the most stable it has been in more than two years as the startup of the expanded Trans Mountain pipeline gives the country’s oil producers new shipping options and a broader pool of buyers.】

item.title: 墨西哥国家石油公司（Pemex）出现亏损，这对新任首席执行官罗德里格斯来说是个负面信号
item.description: 在销售下滑、汇率波动等因素的影响下，墨西哥石油公司第三季度出现亏损，这对墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）钦点的行政领导团队来说是一个负面信号。【原文：Petroleos Mexicanos posted a loss in the third quarter amid slumping sales, currency fluctuations and other factors, a negative sign for Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum’s hand-picked executive leadership team.】

item.title: 纽伯格警告国债收益率将 "持续 "走高
item.description: Neuberger Berman 警告不要逢低买入美国国债，称最近的抛售可能是收益率 "出人意料地持续 "走高的开始。【原文：Neuberger Berman warned against buying US Treasury bonds on dips, saying the recent selloff could be the beginning of a “surprisingly sustained” move higher in yields.】

item.title: Wealthsimple 首席执行官称加拿大生产力落后是一场 "危机
item.description: Wealthsimple Inc. 的负责人称加拿大的生产力问题是一场 "绝对的危机"，需要企业界的大力推动才能解决。【原文：The head of Wealthsimple Inc. called Canada’s productivity problem an “absolute crisis” that will take a major entrepreneurial push to fix.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦从航空公司股权出售候选名单中获得一份投标书
item.description: 由于其他五家财团没有参与巴基斯坦的一次重要私有化尝试，巴基斯坦只收到了一份对国家航空公司股份的竞标。【原文：Pakistan received just one bid for a stake in the national carrier as five other consortiums stayed away from one of the country’s major privatization attempts.】

item.title: 大型科技股期权显示投资者在盈利前保持冷静
item.description: 期权市场对本周科技巨头财报日走势的定价与过去的波动基本一致，投资者对防范大跌的需求有限。【原文：Options markets are pricing earnings-day moves for tech giants reporting this week that are largely in line with past swings, with investors showing limited demand for protection against selloffs.】

item.title: 大跌使国债市场步入两年来最糟糕的一个月
item.description: 在喜忧参半的美国经济数据公布后，国债有望创下两年多来最差的一个月，继续保持跌势。【原文：Treasuries are on track for their worst month in more than two years, holding onto their declines after a mixed reading of US economic data.】

item.title: 与沙特财富基金老板结怨多年后，马斯克在 FII 发表演讲
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在沙特阿拉伯的 "未来投资倡议"（Future Investment Initiative）上出人意料地虚拟亮相，此举表明这位亿万富翁已经与沙特阿拉伯王国修复了关系，在此之前，双方曾在马斯克将特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Elon Musk made a surprise virtual appearance at Saudi Arabia’s Future Investment Initiative in a move that indicated the billionaire has mended relations with the kingdom after the two sides fell out during his short-lived effort to take Tesla Inc. private.】

item.title: 苹果缩小 Mac Mini，这是 Mac Mini 自 2010 年以来的首次改版
item.description: 苹果公司约 15 年来首次全面改进了 Mac mini 台式电脑的设计，将其尺寸缩小到 5 英寸，并增加了速度更快的 M4 芯片。【原文：Apple Inc. overhauled the design of its Mac mini desktop computer for the first time in about 15 years, cutting the device’s size to 5 inches across and adding speedier M4 chips.】

item.title: 以太坊联合创始人的公司 Consensys 裁员 20
item.description: 以太坊网络软件供应商 Consensys Inc. 将裁撤 162 个职位，占其员工总数的 20%。【原文：Consensys Inc., a software provider for the Ethereum network, is eliminating 162 positions, or 20% of its workforce.】

item.title: 新兴市场迫在眉睫的债务螺旋考验国际货币基金组织和世界银行的安全网
item.description: 发展中世界正在酝酿一场流动性紧缩，这给美国支持的国际金融机构带来了更大的压力，要求它们帮助穷国偿还不断增加的债务，并推动亟需的投资。【原文：A liquidity crunch is brewing across the developing world, raising pressure on US-backed international financial institutions to help poor nations meet mounting debt repayments and drive much-needed investments.】

item.title: D.R. Horton大跌，因房屋建筑商称买家暂停购买
item.description: D.R. Horton Inc. 公布了令人失望的第四财季业绩报告，并表示经济承受能力方面的挑战阻碍了购房者，此后该公司股价创下四年多来最大跌幅。【原文：D.R. Horton Inc. shares fell the most in more than four years after the homebuilder reported disappointing results for its fiscal fourth quarter and signaled that affordability challenges are holding back buyers.】

item.title: 住宅建筑商被打得落花流水
item.description: 大家好，欢迎阅读《奇点》时事通讯，它是来自《奇点》世界的每日内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 美国职位空缺降至2021年初以来最低水平
item.description: 美国 9 月份的职位空缺降至 2021 年初以来的最低点，裁员人数回升，这与劳动力市场放缓的趋势一致。【原文：US job openings fell in September to the lowest since early 2021 and layoffs picked up, consistent with a slowdown in the labor market.】

item.title: 加拿大股市的大幅反弹可能比 S&P 500 指数的反弹更持久
item.description: 多伦多罗森伯格研究公司（Rosenberg Research）认为，今年加拿大股市的涨势可能比美国股市的涨势更长，这将鼓励美国投资者将目光投向北方。【原文：The rally in Canadian stocks this year could run longer than the one going on in US equities, offering encouragement for American investors to look North, according to Toronto’s Rosenberg Research.】
